sourcesContent:
import './App.css'; import React, {Component, useState} from "react"; class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isYellowPlayer: true, backgroundColor: "", disabled: false}; } handleClick = () => { this.setState({ isYellowPlayer: true, backgroundColor: "", disabled: false}); if (this.state.isYellowPlayer === true && this.state.isChosenButton === true) { this.setState( { isYellowPlayer: false, backgroundColor: "yellow", disabled: true, isChosenButton: false}); } else { this.setState( { isYellowPlayer: true, backgroundColor: "red", disabled: true, isChosenButton: false}); } } render() { return (
CONNECT 4 GAME

Current Player:

{this.state.backgroundColor}

) } } export default App;
